/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a corridor of urban life. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting light and shadows that add depth to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the green of the trees and the various hues of the buildings. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky.
